metadata.title: CVE-2024-55627 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: Suricata is a network Intrusion Detection System, Intrusion PreventionSystem and Network Security Monitoring engine. Prior to 7.0.8, a speciallycrafted TCP stream can lead to a very large buffer overflow while beingzero-filled during initialization with memset due to an unsigned integerunderflow. The issue has been addressed in Suricata 7.0.8.

criterions.comment: suricata package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
